title: OneDollarCV
description: A platform that allows users to create and download professional CVs for just $1. Leveraged Laravel for backend services, providing a secure, scalable architecture, and integrated A.I-based job suggestions. The front-end was built with a focus on user experience.
keyFeatures: PDF generation and secure download functionality.

title: Broadwrite
description: Developed a marketing website using React.js for Broadwrite, focusing on dynamic content rendering and seamless user interactions. The platform provides assignment assistance to students in multiple academic disciplines.
keyFeatures: Clear presentation of academic services and support.
Engaging user experience focused on clarity and usability.

title: Multi-Step Form
description: Developed a multi-step form with dynamic validation and error handling using React.js. Demonstrates my ability to build complex user interfaces that handle multiple inputs across several steps.
keyFeatures: Real-time error handling for a smoother user experience.
Modern UI with clean form transitions.

title: Sunnyside Agency Landing Page
description: Landing page developed as part of a challenge, aimed at creating a modern and responsive layout using HTML and CSS. The design prioritizes visual appeal and usability.
keyFeatures: Effective use of CSS to enhance visual hierarchy.

title: Laragigs
description: A job listing platform built with Laravel, allowing users to post and manage jobs. The application includes secure authentication and dynamic listing features, providing a full-featured backend and user interface.

title: Mini Testing Framework
description: A lightweight testing framework built from scratch in JavaScript, inspired by Jest. Enables the execution and reporting of test cases, providing a custom test runner and assertion methods.
keyFeatures: Supports test suites with describe and test functions.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio built with React.js and TypeScript, designed to showcase my projects and skills. The website features responsive design, optimized performance, and modern UI built with Sass.
keyFeatures: Dynamic project listings fetched from JSON.
Optimized performance with lazy loading and bundling using Vite.

title: Frontend Mentor Challenges (600points +)
description: A collection of Frontend Mentor challenges completed with a score of 600 points or higher. Demonstrates proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a focus on responsive design and modern UI.
keyFeatures: Modern UI with clean typography and visual hierarchy.
Effective use of CSS for animations and transitions.
Participated in Code Reviews and provided feedback.
